headline: MetLife expands asset management arm with up to $1.2 billion deal for PineBridge
summary: The acquisition will enable MetLife to expand its asset management capabilities, reflecting an emerging trend among insurers looking to leverage their assets for developing tailored investment platforms.  MetLife Investment Management's assets include public fixed income, private capital and real estate investments.  Following the completion of the PineBridge acquisition, its assets under management (AUM) are expected to exceed $700 billion.

headline: MetLife Investment Management to Acquire PineBridge Investments
summary: WHIPPANY, N.J., December 23, 2024--MetLife Investment Management (MIM), the institutional asset management business of MetLife, Inc. (NYSE: MET), today announced that it has reached a definitive agreement to acquire PineBridge Investments (PineBridge), a global asset manager with approximately $100 billion in assets under management,1 from the Pacific Century Group. The transaction is comprised of $800 million in cash at closing, $200 million subject to achieving certain 2025 financial metrics a

headline: US insurer MetLife acquires PineBridge Investments in up to $1.2 billion deal
summary: U.S. insurer MetLife said on Monday it has agreed to buy PineBridge Investments, a global asset manager, from Pacific Century Group in a deal valued at up to $1.2 billion. ...
